NGC 7 - The Dark Eye.meaning: In the heart of a lonely galaxy lies an emptiness that speaks. When this card appears, you're being called to look into the apparent nothingness in your life. What seems like absence may be pregnant with possibility. The void is not empty - it is waiting. What are you afraid to see in the darkness?
NGC 7 - The Dark Eye.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#191970" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="60" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="40" fill="black"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="20" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5"/>
 </svg>

Bo√∂tes Void.meaning: The Great Nothing, a billion light-years of seeming emptiness. This card emerges when you feel isolated, cut off from the familiar world. But remember - even in the universe's greatest void, galaxies still glimmer. Your perceived isolation may be protecting something precious as it develops in silence.
Bo√∂tes Void.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#191970" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="70" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5"/>
 <circle cx="50" cy="110" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="130" cy="190" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="120" cy="100" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <path d="M30,40 L150,260" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.2" opacity="0.3"/>
 <path d="M150,40 L30,260" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.2" opacity="0.3"/>
 </svg>

HCM-6A Dark Galaxy.meaning: A galaxy nearly invisible, filled more with dark matter than stars. When this appears, pay attention to what's not being said, what's not being shown. Your power right now lies in the spaces between words, in the pause between breaths. What truth hides in your silences?
HCM-6A Dark Galaxy.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#191970" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M50,150 Q90,100 130,150 Q90,200 50,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.3" opacity="0.4"/>
 <path d="M70,150 Q90,120 110,150 Q90,180 70,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.2" opacity="0.3"/>
 </svg>

Barnard 68.meaning: The Dark Cloud Nebula, a void that blocks all light. This card speaks to the power of obscurity. Sometimes we must be hidden even from ourselves to transform. What feels like being lost may be necessary gestation. What is taking shape in your shadows?
Barnard 68.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#191970" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="50" fill="black"/>
 <circle cx="60" cy="120" r="1" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="120" cy="180" r="1" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="140" cy="90" r="1" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="40" cy="200" r="1" fill="white"/>
 </svg>

The Local Void.meaning: The enormous emptiness our galaxy is fleeing. This card suggests it's time to acknowledge what you're moving away from. Some voids push us toward our destiny. What emptiness are you trying to escape, and what if it's actually propelling you toward your truth?
The Local Void.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#191970" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M30,40 Q90,150 30,260" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.6"/>
 <path d="M150,40 Q90,150 150,260" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.6"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="60" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.2" opacity="0.3"/>
 </svg>

Alpha Centauri A.meaning: When this card appears, it speaks of a truth you've always known but perhaps forgotten. There is a light within you that has never dimmed, though you may have turned away from it. Now is the time to trust your deepest intuition. The familiar star reminds you: your inner compass knows the way.
Alpha Centauri A.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#FFE5B4" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="60" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="40" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="20" fill="black"/>
 <path d="M90,70 L90,50 M60,120 L40,100 M120,120 L140,100" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
</svg>

Betelgeuse.meaning: The great red star comes to you in times of ending and transformation. Its appearance suggests you're holding onto something that needs to be released. Remember - what appears to be death is often metamorphosis. Ask yourself: what must I let burn away to reveal my true light?
Betelgeuse.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#FFE5B4" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="70" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="3"/>
 <path d="M50,150 Q90,100 130,150 Q90,200 50,150" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M60,130 Q90,170 120,130" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 </svg>

Crab Nebula.meaning: This card appears when you feel scattered, fragmented, torn apart by forces beyond your control. But look closer - in this cosmic destruction lies a pattern of rebirth. Your current chaos is not random; it is the beginning of a new constellation. Trust the unfolding.
Crab Nebula.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#FFE5B4" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M40,100 Q90,50 140,100 Q90,150 40,100 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M60,120 Q90,80 120,120 Q90,160 60,120 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M70,90 Q90,110 110,90 M70,130 Q90,150 110,130" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>
 </svg>

NGC 1316.meaning: The veiled galaxy speaks of hidden pathways and obscured truths. When this card appears, examine what lies in your shadows. There are messages written in what you cannot yet see clearly. Pay attention to your dreams now; they are maps through the dust.
NGC 1316.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#FFE5B4" rx="10"/>
 <ellipse cx="90" cy="150" rx="60" ry="40" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M50,140 Q90,170 130,140" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="4"/>
 <path d="M60,160 Q90,130 120,160" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="3"/>
 </svg>

Pillars of Creation.meaning: This card heralds a time of profound potential. Something is being born in the dark spaces of your life. You are both the creator and the created, the sculptor and the stone. What seems like emptiness is actually pregnant with possibility. What are you ready to bring forth?
Pillars of Creation.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#FFE5B4" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M60,80 Q70,150 65,220 M90,90 Q100,160 95,210 M120,100 Q125,170 115,200" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="4"/>
 <path d="M65,100 Q75,120 70,140 M95,110 Q105,130 100,150" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>
 </svg>

Sagittarius A*.meaning: Our galaxy's central black hole. When this card appears, it speaks of irresistible forces in your life. You may feel pulled toward something or someone with overwhelming intensity. Consider what centers you, what anchors your world. Are you fighting a gravitational force that's meant to transform you?
Sagittarius A*.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#483D8B" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="40" fill="black"/>
 <ellipse cx="90" cy="150" rx="70" ry="20" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <ellipse cx="90" cy="150" rx="60" ry="17" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 <path d="M20,150 Q55,140 85,110 M160,150 Q125,160 95,190" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6"/>
 </svg>

Binary System PSR B19.meaning: The 'Dancing Pulsars.' This card reveals the delicate balance of relationships in your life. Like these spinning stars, you're caught in an intimate dance with forces both supporting and challenging you. Watch for patterns in your connections - what orbits around you, and what do you orbit around?
Binary System PSR B19.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#483D8B" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="70" cy="150" r="20" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="110" cy="150" r="15" fill="white"/>
 <path d="M50,130 Q90,100 130,130 Q90,160 50,130" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 <path d="M60,140 Q90,120 120,140 Q90,160 60,140" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 </svg>

Great Attractor.meaning: A mysterious gravitational anomaly pulling entire galaxy clusters. This card suggests hidden influences shaping your path. Something beyond your current understanding is drawing you forward. Don't resist the pull - sometimes the greatest wisdom comes from surrendering to forces we don't yet comprehend.
Great Attractor.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#483D8B" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M90,80 L90,220" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3"/>
 <path d="M50,100 Q90,150 50,200 M130,100 Q90,150 130,200" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M60,120 Q90,150 60,180 M120,120 Q90,150 120,180" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="30" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 </svg>

Dark Matter Filament.meaning: The invisible scaffold of the cosmos. When this appears, examine the unseen structures supporting your life. What invisible bonds hold your world together? The relationships and commitments that seem intangible may be your greatest source of stability right now.
Dark Matter Filament.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#483D8B" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M50,80 Q90,150 50,220 M90,80 Q130,150 90,220" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.6"/>
 <path d="M70,80 Q110,150 70,220" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.4"/>
 <circle cx="70" cy="100" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.8"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.8"/>
 <circle cx="70" cy="200" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.8"/>
 </svg>

Einstein's Cross.meaning: A gravitationally lensed quasar. This card speaks to perspectives being bent and shifted. What appears as multiple paths may be the same journey seen through different lenses. Trust that even when your way seems distorted, cosmic forces are helping you see more clearly.
Einstein's Cross.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#483D8B" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="30" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="60" cy="120" r="10" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="120" cy="120" r="10" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="60" cy="180" r="10" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="120" cy="180" r="10" fill="white"/>
 <path d="M60,120 Q90,150 120,120 M60,180 Q90,150 120,180" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 </svg>

Pulsar J19+7.meaning: A millisecond pulsar spinning with chaotic precision. When this card appears, you're being called to examine the paradox of order and disorder in your life's timing. Like this strange star that keeps perfect time despite its unusual orbit, you may find your own rhythm in what seems like chaos. Are you fighting your natural cadence?
Pulsar J19+7.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8FBC8F" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="30" fill="black"/>
 <path d="M90,120 L90,90 M90,180 L90,210" stroke="black" stroke-width="3"/>
 <path d="M60,150 A30,30 0 1,1 120,150 A30,30 0 1,1 60,150" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6"/>
 <path d="M60,130 A50,50 0 1,1 120,170" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.4"/>
 </svg>

Methuselah Star.meaning: One of the oldest known stars, ancient beyond measure. This card speaks to deep wisdom earned through experience. You're carrying something ancient within you - perhaps a lesson finally ready to be understood, or an old wound ready to heal. What knowledge has time been trying to teach you?
Methuselah Star.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8FBC8F" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="25" fill="black"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="35" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="45" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="55" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>
 <path d="M90,95 L90,85 M90,205 L90,215" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 </svg>

GN-z11 Galaxy.meaning: Light reaching us from the dawn of time itself. When this appears, you're being asked to look at your origins, your beginnings. Some pattern that started long ago is completing its cycle. Can you see how far you've truly come?
GN-z11 Galaxy.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8FBC8F" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M50,150 Q90,100 130,150" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M60,170 Q90,120 120,170" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M30,110 Q90,150 150,190" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6"/>
 <path d="M30,190 Q90,150 150,110" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6"/>
 </svg>

Hoag's Object.meaning: A ring galaxy that seems to defy time's arrow. This card suggests a moment where past and future converge. You're standing in a perfect circle of now, where old patterns can be broken and new cycles begun. What eternal moment are you living in?
Hoag's Object.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8FBC8F" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="50" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="3"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="20" fill="black"/>
 <path d="M90,100 A50,50 0 1,1 90,200" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="100" r="3" fill="black"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="200" r="3" fill="black"/>
 </svg>

Hour Glass Nebula.meaning: MyCn 18, shaped like time itself. This card emerges when you're acutely aware of time's passage. But remember - even as the sand falls, it creates beautiful patterns. Don't fear time's flow; what seems like an ending may be marking the perfect moment for transformation. What is time revealing to you now?
Hour Glass Nebula.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8FBC8F" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M60,100 Q90,150 60,200 M120,100 Q90,150 120,200" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="80" cy="130" r="2" fill="black"/>
 <circle cx="100" cy="170" r="2" fill="black"/>
 <circle cx="85" cy="150" r="2" fill="black"/>
 <path d="M75,140 Q90,150 105,160" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>
 </svg>

TON 618.meaning: The most massive known black hole, where matter becomes ultimate density. When this card appears, you're dealing with the weight of physical reality. Something in your life has become so dense it's warping everything around it. What heaviness are you ready to transform?
TON 618.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B4513" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="50" fill="black"/>
 <ellipse cx="90" cy="150" rx="70" ry="20" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M30,150 Q60,140 85,120 M150,150 Q120,160 95,180" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5"/>
 </svg>

Cartwheel Galaxy.meaning: A cosmic collision frozen in space, matter reshaping matter. This card speaks to radical physical change. Like this galaxy's violent transformation into beauty, you're in a moment of material restructuring. What form are you being reshaped into?
Cartwheel Galaxy.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B4513" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="60" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="40" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M50,150 Q90,120 130,150 Q90,180 50,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5"/>
 <path d="M60,130 Q90,150 120,170" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6"/>
 </svg>

Bullet Cluster.meaning: Where dark and ordinary matter separate after cosmic impact. When this appears, you're experiencing a separation of what's visible from what's influential. The obvious physical situation may not tell the whole story. What invisible forces are affecting your material reality?
Bullet Cluster.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B4513" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="60" cy="150" r="30" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="120" cy="150" r="30" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M30,150 Q90,100 150,150 Q90,200 30,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.4"/>
 </svg>

Alpha Centauri Bb.meaning: The diamond planet, where carbon crystallized into an entire world. This card suggests a time of pressure creating value. Like carbon becoming diamond, your current constraints may be transforming you into something precious. What is being crystallized in your life?
Alpha Centauri Bb.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B4513" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M90,100 L60,150 L90,200 L120,150 Z" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M60,150 L120,150 M90,100 L90,200" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 <path d="M75,125 L105,175 M105,125 L75,175" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5"/>
 </svg>

LHS 38b.meaning: A bare rocky world stripped to its core elements. This card emerges when you need to face raw reality. All embellishments have been stripped away, leaving only what's essential. What fundamental truths are you ready to confront?
LHS 38b.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B4513" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="45" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M60,130 Q90,140 120,130" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 <path d="M65,150 Q90,160 115,150" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 <path d="M70,170 Q90,180 110,170" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 </svg>

The Wing.meaning: A collision of galaxies creating a wing of chaos. When this card appears, you're in the midst of beautiful destruction. Like these colliding galaxies, what appears as catastrophe is actually a dance of creation. What new forms are emerging from your chaos?
The Wing.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B0000" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M50,120 Q90,80 130,120 Q90,160 50,120" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M60,180 Q90,140 120,180" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M70,100 Q90,130 110,100 M60,160 Q80,140 100,160" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.7"/>
 </svg>

3C 273.meaning: The first known quasar, a cosmic engine of chaos and light. This card speaks to explosive change and unprecedented energy. You're at a point where chaos is about to birth something entirely new. What reality-bending power are you only beginning to grasp?
3C 273.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B0000" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="30" fill="white"/>
 <path d="M90,120 L90,50 M80,60 L90,50 L100,60" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M60,150 Q90,140 120,150 M60,160 Q90,170 120,160" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 </svg>

Pulsar B19.meaning: The first pulsar discovered, its signal first labeled 'LGM-1' (Little Green Men). When this appears, chaos is sending you signals you don't yet understand. What seems random may carry a profound pattern. What message is hiding in your static?
Pulsar B19.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B0000" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M30,150 L60,150 L60,120 L80,180 L100,120 L120,180 L140,150 L150,150" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none"/>
 <path d="M40,140 L50,145 L70,135 L90,155 L110,145 L130,160" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.6"/>
 </svg>

Phoenix Cluster.meaning: A galactic cluster defying cosmic rules, creating stars when it should be quiet. This card suggests creative chaos, breaking the expected order. You're in a period where breaking the rules might be exactly what's needed. What 'impossible' thing are you ready to attempt?
Phoenix Cluster.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B0000" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="40" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="75" cy="135" r="3" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="105" cy="165" r="3" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="85" cy="170" r="3" fill="white"/>
 <path d="M50,150 Q90,100 130,150 Q90,200 50,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6"/>
 </svg>

IC-10.meaning: A rebellious galaxy moving against the flow of our Local Group. When this card emerges, you're being called to embrace your own chaotic nature. Sometimes disruption is the path to truth. What accepted pattern are you meant to challenge?
IC-10.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B0000" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M60,120 Q90,150 120,120 M60,180 Q90,150 120,180" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="75" cy="135" r="4" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="105" cy="165" r="4" fill="white"/>
 <path d="M50,150 Q90,140 130,150" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.7"/>
 </svg>

Whirlpool Galaxy.meaning: Perfect spiral arms dancing with its companion. When this card appears, you're witnessing the beauty of cooperative forces. Like these interacting galaxies, you're in a dance of perfect give and take. What relationships in your life are achieving their natural rhythm?
Whirlpool Galaxy.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B7B8B" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M90,100 A50,50 0 0,1 140,150 A50,50 0 0,1 90,200 A50,50 0 0,1 40,150 A50,50 0 0,1 90,100" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M90,120 A30,30 0 0,1 120,150 A30,30 0 0,1 90,180 A30,30 0 0,1 60,150 A30,30 0 0,1 90,120" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="130" cy="110" r="15" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 </svg>

The Pleiades.meaning: Seven sisters shining in perfect stellar harmony. This card speaks to finding your soul cluster, your cosmic family. You're part of a greater constellation than you realize. What harmonious connections are calling to you?
The Pleiades.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B7B8B" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="5" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="75" cy="130" r="4" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="105" cy="130" r="4" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="80" cy="170" r="4" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="100" cy="170" r="4" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="65" cy="150" r="4" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="115" cy="150" r="4" fill="white"/>
 <path d="M75,130 L105,130 L100,170 L80,170 Z" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.6"/>
 </svg>

Mira.meaning: A binary star where opposites complement perfectly - a red giant and white dwarf in eternal orbit. When this appears, seek balance in apparent contradictions. What seeming opposition in your life might actually be perfect harmony?
Mira.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B7B8B" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="75" cy="150" r="25" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="105" cy="150" r="15" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M50,150 Q90,120 130,150 Q90,180 50,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6"/>
 </svg>

Ring Nebula.meaning: A perfect circle of stellar breath, where death and birth find symmetry. This card emerges when cycles are completing themselves beautifully. What appears to be an ending might be the perfect balance to a beginning. What circle is closing in your life?
Ring Nebula.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B7B8B" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="50" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="40" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="30" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="3" fill="white"/>
 </svg>

NGC 46.meaning: A galaxy spinning backwards yet maintaining perfect form. When this appears, you're finding harmony in unexpected ways. Sometimes what seems wrong is exactly right. What unconventional balance have you discovered?
NGC 46.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#8B7B8B" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M90,100 Q140,150 90,200 M90,100 Q40,150 90,200" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="30" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 <path d="M70,150 Q90,130 110,150 Q90,170 70,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 </svg>

Vela Pulsar.meaning: A stellar dynamo shooting through space, leaving a brilliant wake. When this card appears, you're channeling immense power. Like this star's particle jet, your energy is creating visible trails through the void. What force are you ready to unleash?
Vela Pulsar.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#FF8C00" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="20" fill="black"/>
 <path d="M90,130 L90,70 M90,170 L90,230" stroke="black" stroke-width="4"/>
 <path d="M75,70 Q90,90 105,70 M75,230 Q90,210 105,230" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M80,100 Q90,110 100,100 M80,200 Q90,190 100,200" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>
 </svg>

Double Quasar.meaning: Twin fountains of energy, one image split by spacetime itself. This card speaks to energy multiplied and reflected. Your power right now is greater than you perceive. What impact are you having that you can't yet see?
Double Quasar.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#FF8C00" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="70" cy="150" r="15" fill="black"/>
 <circle cx="110" cy="150" r="15" fill="black"/>
 <path d="M70,135 L70,80 M70,165 L70,220" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M110,135 L110,80 M110,165 L110,220" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M75,150 L105,150" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6"/>
 </svg>

Eta Carinae.meaning: A hypergiant star burning so intensely it shakes itself apart. When this appears, you're experiencing energy that threatens to overwhelm its container. Sometimes we must break our own boundaries to release our true power. What structure can no longer contain you?
Eta Carinae.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#FF8C00" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="30" fill="black"/>
 <path d="M60,150 L30,150 M120,150 L150,150" stroke="black" stroke-width="3"/>
 <path d="M90,120 L90,90 M90,180 L90,210" stroke="black" stroke-width="3"/>
 <path d="M70,130 L50,110 M110,170 L130,190" stroke="black" stroke-width="3"/>
 <path d="M110,130 L130,110 M70,170 L50,190" stroke="black" stroke-width="3"/>
 </svg>

SS 433.meaning: A microquasar whipping jets of energy in a cosmic corkscrew. This card suggests your energy is finding new pathways, spinning in unexpected directions. How are you learning to direct your power?
SS 433.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#FF8C00" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="15" fill="black"/>
 <path d="M90,135 C50,120 50,80 90,65" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M90,165 C130,180 130,220 90,235" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M90,135 C130,120 130,80 90,65" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M90,165 C50,180 50,220 90,235" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
 </svg>

Gamma-Ray Burst 08B.meaning: The brightest cosmic event ever witnessed from Earth. When this card emerges, you're approaching a moment of peak energy. Something is building toward a brilliant flash of transformation. What within you is ready to shine this brightly?
Gamma-Ray Burst 08B.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#FF8C00" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="20" fill="black"/>
 <path d="M50,150 L130,150 M90,110 L90,190" stroke="black" stroke-width="4"/>
 <path d="M60,120 L120,180 M120,120 L60,180" stroke="black" stroke-width="4"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="40" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="60" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.5"/>
 </svg>

Eye of God.meaning: A cosmic eye gazing back at all who observe it. When this card appears, you're being seen by the universe itself. Like this ethereal eye, something deeper is witnessing your journey. What truth do you see when you look into the cosmic mirror?
Eye of God.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#4B0082" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="50" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="35" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="20" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="10" fill="white"/>
 <path d="M40,150 L140,150 M90,100 L90,200" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.6"/>
 </svg>

Ghost Nebula.meaning: A spectral form haunting the cosmic depths. This card speaks to the presence of the intangible. You're encountering the barely perceptible edge where material meets mystery. What is your spirit recognizing that your eyes cannot see?
Ghost Nebula.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#4B0082" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M70,100 Q90,120 110,100 Q130,130 110,160 Q90,180 70,160 Q50,130 70,100" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M80,130 Q90,140 100,130" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 <path d="M75,150 Q90,160 105,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 <circle cx="85" cy="120" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="95" cy="120" r="2" fill="white"/>
 </svg>

Hubble Ultra Deep Field.meaning: The deepest view into space, where every point of light is a galaxy. When this appears, you're being called to recognize your place in infinite awareness. Like these countless galaxies, you're both infinitesimal and infinite. What vast perspective is opening within you?
Hubble Ultra Deep Field.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#4B0082" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="60" cy="130" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="80" cy="160" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="110" cy="140" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="120" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="100" cy="170" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <path d="M60,130 L80,160 L110,140 L90,120 L100,170" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.3"/>
 </svg>

Corona Borealis Void.meaning: A great cosmic emptiness that seems to resonate with purpose. This card emerges when you're touching the consciousness behind apparent nothingness. What meaning do you sense in the spaces between things?
Corona Borealis Void.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#4B0082" rx="10"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="60" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5"/>
 <circle cx="50" cy="110" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="130" cy="110" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="50" cy="190" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <circle cx="130" cy="190" r="2" fill="white"/>
 <path d="M50,110 L130,110 L130,190 L50,190 Z" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.3"/>
 </svg>

Egg Nebula.meaning: A dying star creating shells of light and shadow like layers of consciousness. When this appears, your spirit is moving through veils of reality. Like this cosmic cocoon, you're in a process of emerging into new dimensions of awareness. What layers of understanding are you transcending?
Egg Nebula.image:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 280">
 <rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="260" fill="#4B0082" rx="10"/>
 <path d="M50,150 Q90,100 130,150 Q90,200 50,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
 <path d="M60,150 Q90,110 120,150 Q90,190 60,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5"/>
 <path d="M70,150 Q90,120 110,150 Q90,180 70,150" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1"/>
 <circle cx="90" cy="150" r="5" fill="white"/>
 </svg>
